wikipedia_page.main: Owen Wilfried Medlock (8 March 1938 – 17 October 2021) is an English former footballer who played for Oxford United, Chelsea and Swindon Town. He made a total of 133 appearances for Oxford, and was in goal for their first Football League fixture.

response: *Owen Medlock, 83, English footballer (Chelmsford City, Chelsea, Oxford United).RIP Owen Medlock
